lead_paragraph: Business spending intentions weakened in April for a third month, but jobless claims fell and pending home sales reached a 10-year high.

headline.print_headline: Business Investing Lags,  but Housing Sales Surge
headline.main: Business Investment Lags, but Housing Sales Surge

snippet: Business spending intentions weakened in April for a third month, but jobless claims fell and pending home sales reached a 10-year high.
abstract: Commerce Dept reports orders for nonmilitary capital goods excluding aircraft fell 0.8 percent in April, from 0.1 percent drop in March; National Association of Realtors reports pending home sales index rose 5.1 percent in April; Labor Dept reports claims for state unemployment benefits fell 10,000 to seasonally adjusted 268,000 for week ended May 21.
